entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of drizzle. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow or ice pellets ending late this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of drizzle. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and overnight. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022
